text: Andriy Petrovych Oliynyk is a Ukrainian footballer playing as forward. He became a top scorer of the 2010-11 Ukrainian Cup. ==External links== * * Profile at the Professional Football League of Ukraine website * Profile at the Football Federation of Kolomyia Raion Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Spartak Ivano-Frankivsk players Category:FC Prykarpattya Ivano-Frankivsk players Category:FC Naftovyk Dolyna players Category:FC Kalush players Category:FC Luzhany players Category:FC Karpaty Yaremche players Category:Ukrainian Cup top scorers Category:Association football forwards
title: Andriy Oliynyk (footballer, born 1983)
